skills.title: About Me
skills.description:
Developer since 2020, specialized in game development using PixiJS for HTML5.
My main strength is TypeScript, although I have also worked with modern frameworks such as Angular and React for building interactive interfaces.
With React and Redux, I have experience creating desktop applications and management systems using Electron, which allows me to develop complete and cross-platform solutions.
Angular was used to build this portfolio.
I also have experience with engines like Unreal Engine, UEFN, and Unity, which has allowed me to participate in various 2D and 3D projects.
Since 2022, I have been working professionally in the video game development industry.
I am known for my strong social skills and adaptability to teamwork and collaborative environments.
